message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its value to you, we believe it would be beneficial for both parties to discuss a fair transaction. We kindly propose an offer of $950,000 for the product. We are confident this price reflects its true worth while allowing for a reasonable profit for us. We look forward to your consideration and hope to facilitate a mutually beneficial agreement.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value of your product, $950,000 is unfortunately above my budget. I am willing to pay $850,000 for the product, which I believe is a fair price given its value to me and allows for a profit for you.  I am confident we can find a mutually agreeable price.  Let me know your thoughts.
